text:
Wilhelm Werner Müller (1 June 1946 – 15 July 2019) was a German politician and businessman. He was Federal Ministry of Economic Affairs and Energy from 1998 to 2002. Müller was born in Essen, Germany.
Müller died on 15 July 2019 in Essen from cancer at the age of 73.

annotations.surface_form: Federal Ministry of Economic Affairs and Energy
